content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Jan 2019Will I be able to afford a resale Maisonette worth 750K?I will begin working in May 2019 (job in government sector with ~$4600 salary (gross income) while my fiance is already working since March 2018 with a salary of $2800. We are looking to get a HDB maisonette worth 750K as my mom is willing to pay 100K for the downpayment. On top of that, I have around 15K in CPF while my fiance has around 10k. Is it wise to get a maisonette near the MRT with 67 years of lease left if I'm not planning to move? Or stick to my BTO at fernvale and move in future?2 answersAnswerBump0
